content:
Goal
* Please add at the beginning:

<<This clash is in Reverse mode only.>>

Stub generator
* Please change 180 to 9.

Cases
* Validator 6: Please use 163258749 (from Validator 7) instead so that it's more similar to Test 6.

* Validator 7: Please modify the case to be similar to Test 7 but slightly different.

Thanks.

Thanks for your comment!
I have updated the tests and I open the contribution to by played with all categories of Clash.

Thank you. Additional changes are required as modes other than Reverse have been enabled:

Goal
* Please change as follows:
  • entry => input
  • For each => For each digit
  • his => its
  • position and => position (begins at 1) and
  • a even => an even
  • a odd => an odd
  • mod10 of this digit plus digits position => (digit plus position) mod 10
  • mod10 of this digit minus digits position => (digit minus position) mod 10
  • (the position begins at 1) => [delete the whole sentence]

* Please add at the end:

Output the resultant digits concatenated together.

Output
* Please change "Another" to "The transformed".

Constraints
* Please add:

The input contains 1 to 9 digits.

Thanks again.
